metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23181 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The fix for bug CVE-2020-9484 introduced a time of check, time of usevulnerability into Apache Tomcat 10.1.0-M1 to 10.1.0-M8, 10.0.0-M5 to10.0.14, 9.0.35 to 9.0.56 and 8.5.55 to 8.5.73 that allowed a localattacker to perform actions with the privileges of the user that the Tomcatprocess is using. This issue is only exploitable when Tomcat is configuredto persist sessions using the FileStore.

criterions.comment: tomcat8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
